page.title: 09SHREWTON SCHOOL
page.content: Shrewton Church of England Primary School was built in 1869. It is a split site school divided by the High Street and the river Till. It has 130 children on roll. There are five classes: Mr. G. C. Hunter is the Headmaster Mrs. J Eaton is Deputy Head and teaches Class 1 - 4/5 year olds. Mrs. J Hughes, Class 2 - 5/6 years. Mrs. J Cross, Class 3 - 6/7 years. Mr. C England, Class 4 - 8/9 years. Mrs. E Annetts, Class 5 - 9/10 years. Mrs. P Eggleton is School Secretary. Mrs. N Whalley is Welfare Assistant. Mrs. J Palmer is Cook-in-Charge in school kitchen. Mrs. W Lovelock is Caretaker and Cleaner-in-Charge. Mrs. S Woods is our Crossing Patrol Attendant.
